title: Set Up Dummy Foundation
description:
## Scope
Create the foundational dummy files and configuration needed for subsequent dummy work.

## Technical Details
- Create a placeholder module at `dummy/index.js` with a basic export
- Add a simple configuration object with project name and version
- Export a `greet` function that returns a greeting string

## Acceptance Criteria
- `dummy/index.js` exists and exports a `greet` function
- The function returns a string containing the project name
- Module can be imported without errors
guidance: This is a dummy story for testing. Keep the implementation minimal.
doneWhen: The dummy module exists, exports correctly, and tests pass.
avoid: Do not add any real functionality or dependencies.
